sections.heading: Districts; presumption of organization
sections.text: Every school district shall in all cases be presumed to have been legally organized when it has exercised the franchises and privileges of a district for the term of one year.SourceLaws 1881, c. 78, subdivision III, ยง 8, p. 344;R.S.1913, ยง 6759;C.S.1922, ยง 6300
